bug.author: cyberprodigy
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
Documentation in Making Predictions from 2D Data 4. Define the model architecture Under section : Add layers <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
All <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
The first sentence says "This adds a hidden layer to our network. " That is wrong. It should instead say - "This adds an input layer to our network. " There are input layers, hidden layers and output layers in neural networks

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cyberprodigy>@cyberprodigy</denchmark-link> thank you for reporting , send out a fix will be updated soon.

This is <denchmark-link:https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tfjs-training-regression/index.html#3>fixed</denchmark-link> now please verify. Thank you <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tafsiri>@tafsiri</denchmark-link> & Jason
